extendedInfo.description: Icarus is a realistic flight simulator for Android devices. It uses the same flight physics engine used by FlightGear, so flight physics is ultra real. Control the aircraft using a virtual onscreen joystick. It also features realistic terrain and cloud system.Game features:1) Realistic flight dynamics2) Photo realistic scenery3) Pseudo volumetric clouds4) Multiple airports to start from5) Unique controls6) No in-game Ads, no spamwareNOTE: Icarus is heavy on graphics and memory. If it crashes often then lower graphics detail and draw distance.

reviews.title: Looks great but is not downloading
reviews.comment: Is your server down guys? I\'m trying to download for long time with the fastest connection money can buy but I can\'t download it. It\'s just 135 MB. =-/ Make it work so I will give it 6 stars. Thanks!
reviews.author: Fabiano Clav\303\251

reviews.title: Awesome!
reviews.comment: Ive played every realistic flight sim on the market, and they all plain suck...  except for Icarus and x plane.  Kudos to the designers and keep up the good work!
reviews.author: scott olson

reviews.title: Awesome sim
reviews.comment: Been waiting a long time for a FlightGeat-based sim, so glad to find one. Looking forward to updates, hopefully could one day fly multiplayer with FlightGear pilots!
reviews.author: David Young

reviews.title: Very good keep it up!
reviews.comment: the way i see it, this Sim has tremendous potential and i fly it all the time, the engine sounds are accurate and true, as well as the flight model visuals. this is way better than x plane ,  ground,weather and sky are excellent!!!. my request? please add ground aprons and taxiways at the airports, with a  default tower and terminal, like fsx.Also, a map or V OR display to have the guidance to fly from airport to airport .a low wing single engine plane like a piper arrow or cherokee would be good. your sim is the BEST
reviews.author: chris salton

reviews.title: Cool flight Simulator but
reviews.comment: The Worst Part Are                                                                         1.AirPlane Crash To The Land Is Not With Explode. Only Crash              2.AirPlane Crash To The Building, That Airplane Is Not Destroyed But, Is Like A Ghost. But, This Is A Cool Flight Simulator.
reviews.author: Kautsar Ramadhan

reviews.title: 5-Star Flight Sim!
reviews.comment: I\'m a private pilot and must say this is one of the best flight sims out there on the market today. Good-looking terrain, excellent sounds and fun models make this a great app for anyone. Things I would like to see:  - Dual throttle control, so we don\'t have to move each throttle individually on the twin  - Map, GPS or some sort of VOR coding so I can find other airports (Though dead-reckoning does work!)  -Quicker control response time, both on tilt and joystick  -Buttons for rudder pedals
